title: The History of Hip Hop
description: What is Hip Hop?The History of Hip Hop by Eric Reese is a dynamic story of the musical revolution known as hip hop. This cultural phenomenon ushered in an exciting new generation of music, urban culture, street art, fashion, black history, and yes, even a way of life. Eric Reese has written one of the definitive hip hop generation pieces of our time; the story of a musical genre that began on the streets of the Bronx and Brooklyn and quickly exploded onto the world stage.If you love hip hop, you will love this. It has been 40 years since the genre known as rap burst onto the musical scene. And, hip hop is undoubtedly the most influential musical genre to emerge during the last several decades.
author: Eric Reese
